function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuous operation of data processing rooms with servers and racks in administrative building","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential heat generation, leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing energy-efficient practices and technologies, optimizing server operations, and improving ventilation systems","Technologies":"Energy-efficient servers, virtualization, high-efficiency HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, IT department"},{"Description":"Equipment left in stand-by mode","Impact":"Unnecessary energy consumption and potential heat generation, increasing the risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing power management settings, promoting shutdown of unused equipment, and conducting energy efficiency awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Power management software, smart plugs, energy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, IT department","Owner":"Facility management, IT department"},{"Description":"Continuous operation of equipment such as refrigerators and stand-by plug loads in elementary and nursery schools","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential heat generation, leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing energy-efficient appliances, promoting power management practices, and conducting energy efficiency awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Energy-efficient refrigerators, power management software, smart plugs","People":"School staff, students, visitors","Owner":"School administration"}]}
